akn:content.akn:p: In analyzing compliance for the relevant projects under the purview of the Office of the Deputy Mayor for Planning and Economic Development, the Unit is authorized to look at:

To carry out its duties, the Unit is authorized to make site visits and meet with government and private-sector project staff members to evaluate whether each project was completed, or is being completed, in accordance with the documents referenced in subsection (a) of this section.

In reviewing the annual report required by §§ 2-218.50 and 2-218.53, and the annual report, the Unit is authorized to look at any contracts, accounts, records, reports, findings, and all other papers, things, or property belonging to or in use by the District government and contractor.
